title: Artful Waterfront Duplex Retreat in Port District
description: Experience expansive living in this luxurious three-bedroom, three-bathroom duplex boasting 142 sqm of masterfully designed space. Open concept social areas flow elegantly to a state-of-the-art, sunlit kitchen. Private elevator access conveys modern convenience, while an underground garage offers security and direct entry. Peaceful upper-level retreats and a guest bathroom round out this signature home—perfectly balancing comfort and sophistication.
neighborhood_description: Set in the charming Port District of Ustka, this duplex benefits from a tranquil, low-urban environment steeped in local character. You'll enjoy immediate access to the picturesque waterfront while being moments away from artist studios, boutique cafés, and lively seasonal markets. Highway and well-maintained bike lines ensure convenient travel, with serene coastal pathways just meters from your door.
lifestyle_benefits: direct access to port-side cafés and galleries
proximity to the Baltic Sea for daily inspiration
target_buyer: Discerning artists, creatives, and remote professionals yearning for inspiration and tranquility, where living and working meet artfully.
market_positioning: This property exemplifies luxury coastal living for connoisseurs seeking exclusivity and creative resonance, standing apart as one of the most expansive and elegantly appointed residences on Ustka’s waterfront.
